ModMetaData.name: Misc. MapGen Xtension 'Urban Biome'
ModMetaData.author: Haplo
ModMetaData.description:
*** You must load Miscellaneous CORE first for this to work without errors! *** *** You must load Miscellaneous MapGenerator BEFORE this to work! ***
This will provide biomes with an urban like map from the blueprints provided in Misc MapGenerator.
### Recommended Mod sequence ### - Core - ... - Miscellaneous Core - ... - Misc. MapGenerator - Misc. MapGen Xtension 'Urban'
!!! WARNING !!! Because of how it works, it sometimes may happen that you get attacked by Mechanoids or Insects shortly after the start!
(Version: 0.19.2)
